ComicInfo.Series: Young Hellboy: Assault on Castle Death
ComicInfo.Summary: Assault on Castle Death [Part Three]: A feverish Hellboy, believing himself to be aiding Lobster Johnson in a battle against evil forces, roams the BPRD headquarters, pursued by Brother Robert. Samuel the janitor tries to stop Robert but is injured.
ComicInfo.Teams: Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense
